description.value: Whenever the Character takes an action to give directions to one or more of their Drones, they can have it affect up to Intelligence Bonus Drones instead.

system.benefit: Whenever the Character takes an action to give directions to one or more of their Drones, they can have it affect up to Intelligence Bonus Drones instead.

prerequisites.text: Tau Drone Handler Alternative Advance, 800xp, Intelligence 45+, Trade(Technomat)
